moves.1. e4: This gets wild in a hurry. I usually don't fasten my seat belt till at least a half dozen moves
moves.1... e5: I have no clue how to open as black. This seems safe enough. Someday I'm gonna have to learn some good opening moves
moves.2. Qh5: What's that all about? This guy looks serious
moves.3. d4: At this stage I had no idea how to proceed. Both bishops are free to attack and queen looking very menacing. With me nothing going on.
moves.3... exd4: Had to.  Anything else leaves him too strong
moves.4. Bd3 h6: Trying to slow down black bishop from getting into the fray
moves.5. Bf4: Things seem to be going downhill quickly
moves.6... c5: Things looking up slightly with strong center developing
moves.7. Na3 Nf6: Finally something for him to think about
moves.8. Qc4 d5 9. Qb5+ Qd7: Please trade and get out of my kitchen.
moves.11... Nxe4 12. Qxd4 O-O 13. Bxg7: Looking pretty bad again. Must keep attacking
moves.13... Nc6 14. Qe3 Kxg7: The game is on. Finally some breathing room. My dev't is perhaps even better.
moves.15. Bxe4 dxe4 16. Rd1: Perhaps castling would have been better
? Maybe better captured with King. Anyway glad to finally see some retreat.
moves.19... f5: The eventual winning pawn surge begins.
moves.20... Be6: Freeing the rook while attacking unprotected pawn
moves.21. c4 b6: The pawns are gonna have to protects themselves, everbody else is going to war soon
Finally my nose in front a point, with dev't ripe with possibilities.
moves.26. Re1 Qd7 27. b3 Ba6 28. Rd1: would love to trade the big guns off and waltz in the end zone with a pawn.
moves.30. Ne2: Yes, this is indeed looking promising.
moves.32... f4: I'm beginning to like my chances
moves.33. g3 g5: This move took awhile to to figure out. There were tons of other possibilities, but it was probably the decisive move that sealed the deal.
moves.34... Kg6 35. b4: Not sure why. Probably nothing better.
moves.35... e3: Earlier pawn move looking better all the time. Should'nt be much longer.
moves.38. Ke1 Qg1+: Ballgame! Now I know why people don't get wild with their queen early. Thanks Mojawi for an exciting game from the get-go

gameName: Team match - Queen on the loose
